data.Sentence_cn: 当约翰.吉尔伯特住院的时候，他问医生他的手术是否成功，
data.Sentence: While John Gilbert was in hospital, he asked his doctor to tell him whether his operation had been successful,
but the doctor refused to do so.

data.Sentence_cn: 第二天，这位病人要了一部床头电话。
data.Sentence: The following day, the patient asked for a bedside telephone.

data.Sentence_cn: 当房里只剩他一个人时，他挂通了医院的交换台，要求与米灵顿医生讲话。
data.Sentence: When he was alone, he telephoned the hospital exchange and asked for Doctor Millington.

data.Sentence_cn: 当这位医生接过电话时，吉尔伯特先生说他想询问一个病人的情况，是一位名叫约翰.吉尔伯特的先生。
data.Sentence: When the doctor answered the phone, Mr.Gilbert said he was inquiring about a certain patient, a Mr.John Gilbert.

data.Sentence_cn: 他问吉尔伯特先生的手术中否成功，医生告诉他手术很成功。
data.Sentence: He asked if Mr.Gilbert's operation had been successful and the doctor told him that it had been.

data.Sentence_cn: 然后他又问吉尔伯特先生什么时候可以回家，
data.Sentence: He then asked when Mr.Gilbert would be allowed to go home

data.Sentence_cn: 医生说他在医院还必须再住上两个星期。
data.Sentence: and the doctor told him that he would have to stay in hospital for another two weeks.

data.Sentence_cn: 之后，米灵顿医生问打电话的人是否是病人的亲属。
data.Sentence: Then Dr.Millington asked the caller if he was a relative of the patient.

data.Sentence_cn: “不是，”病人回答说，“我就是约翰.吉尔伯特先生。”
data.Sentence: 'No,' the patient answered, 'I am Mr.John Gilbert.'
